name: Asteroid Colonist Prototype
description:
This is an unfinished prototype build,

Click "Next" on the bottom right to end your turn (or get to the next colony if you have not set all production)

Build buildings and units on your existing colonies(left sroll menu, if you click on your colonynames)

, and expand with the use of colonists(uncolonized asteroids) and battleships(attack npc), (on the colony menueAn Explorer finds the availability of minable resources on an (uncoloniced) asteroid before you colonize it. Stats integration not working properly because of some testing purposes.

May contain Bugs
